shortcode.value: Insert [shortcode] of any WordPress plugin installed on your website.

options.label: Shortcode
options.description: Copy your shortcode here with all the correct parameters. The shortcode must be installed on your WordPress site via plugin or theme.

options.label: Extra class name
options.description: Add an extra class name to the element and refer to it from Custom CSS option.

options.label: Element ID
options.description: Apply unique Id to element to link directly to it by using #your_id (for element id use lowercase input only).
